function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social interaction due to reliance on smart technologies","Impact":"Increased social isolation and loneliness","Mitigation":"Encouraging in-person social interactions and community engagement","Technologies":"Non-digital social engagement tools","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Community organizations"},{"Description":"Over-reliance on smart technologies for health information","Impact":"Risk of misinformation and inadequate healthcare access","Mitigation":"Promoting verified and reliable health resources, providing education on critical health literacy","Technologies":"Digital health platforms, telemedicine services","People":"Older adults","Owner":"Healthcare providers and organizations"},{"Description":"Dependency on smart robots for healthcare tasks","Impact":"Loss of human touch in healthcare, potential overburden on technology","Mitigation":"Balancing technology use with human care, ongoing training and supervision for robot use","Technologies":"Smart robotics, AI-assisted healthcare systems","People":"Healthcare staff, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"}]}
